title: travelplanner: Could you help design a travel plan for two people leaving from Houston to Pensacola for 3 days, from March 6th to March 8th, 2022? Our budget is set at $1,400 for this trip and we require our accommodations to be visitor-friendly. We would like to have options to dine at Indian, American, Chinese, and Italian restaurants. We also prefer not to self-drive during the trip. (1ac1add32bdc57ed)

always_included_messages.content:
Based on the user's query, make the best travel plan for the user and save it. Do not ask follow-up questions.
Use your best judgement in finding alternatives if possible. Don't give up - ALWAYS save a plan!

We also prefer not to self-drive during the trip.

chat_history.name: attraction_search

chat_history.content:
I have found a number of flights, accommodations, restaurants and attractions for you.

## Flights
There are five flights available on 6 March 2022:
- Flight F3855861 departs at 11:54 and arrives at 13:21.
- Flight F3900892 departs at 16:45 and arrives at 18:16.
- Flight F3901232 departs at 20:00 and arrives at 21:25.
- Flight F3931162 departs at 09:33 and arrives at 10:59.
- Flight F3994851 departs at 14:07 and arrives at 15:23.
All flights cost under $200 and travel time is approximately 1 hour and 25 minutes.

## Accommodation
I found these options for your stay in Pensacola:
- An amazing apartment near the museum, gardens and park. A one-bedroom apartment for $74 per night.
- A charming one-bedroom apartment in LES/Chinatown for $430 per night.
- A spacious one-bedroom haven in a duplex with a deck for $1050 per night.

## Restaurants
I found these restaurants that serve the cuisine you are looking for:
- Frog Hollow Tavern serves American, BBQ, fast food, cafe, and Indian food, with an average cost of $20.
- Blue Point Grill serves French, Indian, cafe, and desserts, with an average cost of $75.
- Nukkad serves tea, cafe, American and Italian food, with an average cost of $100.
- Kayasth Cuisine serves desserts, cafe, BBQ, fast food, Chinese and American food, with an average cost of $69.
- South Indian Hut serves tea, seafood and fast food, with an average cost of $48.
- Krispy Kitchen serves fast food, bakery, desserts and Italian food, with an average cost of $78.
- Mithaas Sweets serves pizza, bakery, BBQ, cafe, Indian, Mediterranean food, with an average cost of $86.

## Attractions
Here are some attractions you may want to visit whilst in Pensacola:
- The Historic Pensacola Village.
- The Pensacola Museum of Art.
- Palafox Street Downtown Pensacola.
- The Plaza De Luna Memorial Monument.
- The Graffiti Bridge.
- The Pensacola Children's Museum.
- Go Retro.
- The Museum of Commerce.
- The Quina House Museum.
- Bay Bluffs Park.
- Pensacola MESS Hall.
- Pensacola Bay City Ferry.
- The Museum of Industry.
- Seville Square.
- Fort Pickens.

## Travel Plan
Given your preferences, I have designed the following travel plan for your short stay in Pensacola, Florida:

**Day 1:**
- Take the earliest flight, F3931162, which departs at 09:33 and arrives at 10:59.
- Check into your amazing apartment near the museum, gardens and park.
- Take a walk to the nearby Historic Pensacola Village and Pensacola Museum of Art.
- Enjoy a lunch of American, BBQ, fast food, cafe, and Indian food at Frog Hollow Tavern.
- Explore the Pensacola Children's Museum and the Museum of Commerce.
- Head to Palafox Street Downtown to explore the Plaza De Luna Memorial Monument, The Graffiti Bridge and Go Retro.
- For dinner, enjoy Italian cuisine at Krispy Kitchen.

**Day 2:**
- Start the day with a visit to the Bay Bluffs Park.
- Take a trip to the Pensacola MESS Hall and the nearby Museum of Industry.
- Have lunch at Nukkad, where they serve a variety of cuisines, including tea, cafe, American and Italian food.
- Explore the Pensacola Bay City Ferry.
- Visit the Quina House Museum and Seville Square.
- Finish the day with dinner at Mithaas Sweets, a restaurant offering a unique blend of pizza, bakery, BBQ, cafe, Indian, and Mediterranean cuisine.

**Day 3:**
- Visit Fort Pickens for a morning trip.
- Enjoy a final lunch at Kayasth Cuisine, which offers an extensive menu featuring desserts, cafe, BBQ, fast food, Chinese, and American cuisine.
- Return to the airport for your flight home.

This itinerary offers a blend of cultural exploration, culinary experiences, and outdoor activities, allowing you to make the most of your short stay in Pensacola. 

Please note that I was unable to find any transportation options apart from the flights to and from Pensacola.

I have saved this plan for future reference.

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.

functions.name: submit_day_plan
functions.desc:
Once you have collected information about the trip, call this function once for each day of the trip, starting on day 1.
If a field does not apply for a given day, use "-" to indicate this.
You MUST call this function to save the plan for each query.

current_city.description: The city for this day. If the plan is to travel between two cities, indicate it as "from A to B" (e.g. "from Ithaca to Charlotte").

transportation.description: e.g. "Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46"

breakfast.description: The name of a restaurant in the city, e.g. "Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte"

attraction.description: Use a ";" to separate different attractions, with each attraction formatted as "Name, City". e.g. "The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte;"

accommodation.description: e.g. "Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte"
